
Market history data downloaded from sina.com and yahoo.com will be cached here.

including:

{symbol}_1d.csv, daily history data of stocks and index

{symbol}_1d_f.csv, stock adjust factor data (for China stock)

{symbol}_ff.csv, stock fund flow daily history data (for China stock)

index started with ^, like ^GSPC, ^ will be replaced with _ when being saved.
This is to avoid ^ causing problem when delete by hand.
For example, _GSPC_1d.csv is for index ^GSPC.
